content: frostlight 1 5 dl sc1202 ffffrrrroooossssttttlllliiiigggghhhhtttt an original design for modern knitting by robin ulrich ffffrrrroooossssttttlllliiiigggghhhhtttt page 2 pattern notes bobble 1 read through entire pattern before beginning 2 pattern calls for 44 co sts customize scarf to desired width by adding or sub- tracting co sts in multiples of 6 i e 38 or 50 3 choose needle size carefully small needles may create stiff dense sts but large needles may create overly loose sts 4 fringes 48 strands require approx 20 yds /18 m of yarn if you are close on yardage it may be a good idea to cut fringes before knitting the scarf add addi- co tional strands in sets of 16 i e 64 5 chart row are read from right to left on rs odd row and left to right on ws even row 6 see my blog for a video tutorial with tips materials for working evenly-sized yo sts yyyyaaaarrrrnnnn http //robinulrich blogspot com/ scarf requires approximately 420 yds/ 7 see my blog for a video tutorial on making 384 m heavy worsted weight yarn and attaching fringes project shown in malabrigo merino http //robinulrich blogspot com/ worsted 100% merino wool 210 yd/ 192 m per 100 g skein #606/ frost abbreviations gray 2 skeins bobble bind off co cast on nnnneeeeeeeeddddlllleeeessss k knit suggested needle size is only a place to start k2tog k 2 sts together adjust needle size to achieve desired gauge p purl us #8/ 5 mm see pattern notes #3 repeat s repeat s rs right side nnnnoooottttiiiioooonnnnssss ssk sl 2 sts as if to knit one at a time to blunt tapestry needle right needle insert left needle into crochet hook us h/ 5 mm to attach fronts of both slipped sts and k2tog fringes if desired st s stitch es ws wrong side finished measurements yo yarn over measurements listed are post-blocking width 7 1/2 / 19 cm length 70 / 178 cm gauge 17 sts = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette st on size us #8/ 5 mm needles see pattern notes #3 20 sts = 4 / 10 cm in frostlight st on size us #8/ 5 mm needles see pattern notes #3 frostlight © robin ulrich studio 2014 robinulrich blogspot com gnittink fo noitcerid 70 7 1/2 ffffrrrroooossssttttlllliiiigggghhhhtttt page 3 frostlight stitch chart
